selected_quotes: It's important to measure the impact of publicly funded research on society. But how?
No easy way to measure impact
No easy way to measure the impact of university research on society via Govt call to private …
Challenges in measuring the impact of academic research on society

citation.abstract: Publicly-funded research should contribute to society in some way. But we need to think carefully about how we create a system that allows us to measure the impact of research.
citation.title: There is no easy way to measure the impact of university research on society

news.title: 2015, the year that was: Education
news.summary: 2013 was the year of Gonski; 2014 the year of higher education reform; 2015 has been the year of … hmmm … wait, what actually happened this year? Just a lot of chat really, with much debate, but little action on reforming education in Australia.

news.title: When measuring research, we must remember that 'engagement' and 'impact' are not the same thing
news.summary: In the Innovation Statement late last year, the federal government indicated a strong belief that more collaboration should occur between industry and university researchers.

news.title: University changes to academic contracts are threatening freedom of speech
news.summary: Some universities are attempting to insert new clauses into their employment contracts that aim to limit academics’ ability to speak freely in public debate.
